topic.title: Test Case 5: Conref to Keyref to a Text-Only Key In The Title:

section.title: Case 5.1: Conref to a specialization of referencing element:
section.p: This is a conref to apiname from keyword "in-title" using "#test-case-05/in-title":
This is a conref to apiname from keyword "in-title" using "#./in-title":

section.title: Case 5.2: Unscoped keyref
section.p: This is a keyref to text-only key "test-only-key-01" in the default scope. It has the ID "keyref-01":
This is a conref to the phrase "keyref-01" using "#test-case-05/keyref-01":
This is a conref to the phrase "keyref-01" using "#./keyref-01":

section.title: Case 5.3: Scoped keyref
section.p: This is a keyref to text-only key "test-only-key-02" in scope "scope-01". It has the ID "keyref-02":
This is a conref to the phrase "keyref-02" using "#test-case-05/keyref-02":
This is a conref to the phrase "keyref-02" using "#./keyref-02":
